  • Classes in net.beaconcontroller.core used by net.beaconcontroller.core 
    Class and Description
    IOFInitializerListener
    This interface is used by listeners that need to perform switch interaction prior to making the switch generally available to IOFMessageListeners.
    IOFMessageListener 
    IOFMessageListener.Command 
    IOFSwitch 
    IOFSwitchListener 
    OFSwitchState 
  • Classes in net.beaconcontroller.core used by net.beaconcontroller.core.internal 
    Class and Description
    IBeaconProvider
    The interface exposed by the core bundle that allows you to interact with connected switches.
    IOFInitializerListener
    This interface is used by listeners that need to perform switch interaction prior to making the switch generally available to IOFMessageListeners.
    IOFMessageListener 
    IOFMessageListener.Command 
    IOFSwitch 
    IOFSwitchFilter
    Used in conjunction with IOFMessageListener to allow a listener to filter an incoming message based on the IOFSwitch it originated from.
    IOFSwitchListener 
    OFSwitchState
